Articles.Content: Hi, i am newbie here. I just start playing KSP. So far i have managed to build several plane and fly them, landing is not an option though. So, im interested in learning KOS script to automatically fly and land them. Does anyone have a sample script that i can use? Thank you very much!

Welcome to our forum, @OverClock.  

I have moved your question to its own thread in the modding subforum, because I think you will receive answers here more quickly. You didn't do anything wrong by posting it in the welcome sub. I'm merely trying to be helpful.

3 hours ago, OverClock said:

Hi, i am newbie here. I just start playing KSP. So far i have managed to build several plane and fly them, landing is not an option though. So, im interested in learning KOS script to automatically fly and land them. Does anyone have a sample script that i can use? Thank you very much!

If you want to land your craft nicely, first have a nice approach onto the runway, keeping your speed low. Just above stall speed is good. Then, just before touchdown, pull up on the elevator, making the plane pitch up. But due to your low airspeed you won't go up but merely slow your descent resulting in a gentle touchdown.

Hope this helps!
